mutants.mutated_line: my_regexp = ''
mutants.code:
import re

def calculate_polynomial_derivative(polynomial: str) -> str:
    my_regexp = ''
    as_int = lambda s: int(s) if s else 1
    result = ''
    for monom in re.finditer(my_regexp, polynomial):
        (sign, coeff, exp) = monom.groups()
        (coeff, exp) = list(map(as_int, (coeff, exp)))
        coeff *= exp
        exp -= 1
        if coeff != 0:
            result += ('{sign}{coeff}' if exp == 0 else '{sign}{coeff}x' if exp == 1 else '{sign}{coeff}x^{exp}').format(sign=sign, coeff=coeff, exp=exp)
    return result if result else '0'

mutants.original_line: result = ''
mutants.mutated_line: result = 'MUTATED'

def calculate_polynomial_derivative(polynomial: str) -> str:
    my_regexp = '(?P<sign>[+\\-]?)(?P<coeff>\\d*)x(?:\\^(?P<exp>\\d+))?'
    as_int = lambda s: int(s) if s else 1
    result = 'MUTATED'

def calculate_polynomial_derivative(polynomial: str) -> str:
    my_regexp = '(?P<sign>[+\\-]?)(?P<coeff>\\d*)x(?:\\^(?P<exp>\\d+))?'
    as_int = lambda s: int(s) if s else 1
    result = ''
    for monom in re.finditer(my_regexp, polynomial):
        (sign, coeff, exp) = monom.groups()
        (coeff, exp) = list(map(as_int, (coeff, exp)))
        coeff *= exp
        exp -= 1
        if coeff != 0:
            result += ('{sign}{coeff}' if exp == 0 else '{sign}{coeff}x' if exp == 1 else '').format(sign=sign, coeff=coeff, exp=exp)

import re

def calculate_polynomial_derivative(polynomial: str) -> str:
    my_regexp = '(?P<sign>[+\\-]?)(?P<coeff>\\d*)x(?:\\^(?P<exp>\\d+))?'
    as_int = lambda s: int(s) if s else 1
    result = ''
    for monom in re.finditer(my_regexp, polynomial):
        (sign, coeff, exp) = monom.groups()
        (coeff, exp) = list(map(as_int, (coeff, exp)))
        coeff *= exp
        exp -= 1
        if coeff != 0:
            result += ('{sign}{coeff}' if exp == 0 else '{sign}{coeff}x' if exp == 2 else '{sign}{coeff}x^{exp}').format(sign=sign, coeff=coeff, exp=exp)
    return result if result else '0'

import re

def calculate_polynomial_derivative(polynomial: str) -> str:
    my_regexp = '(?P<sign>[+\\-]?)(?P<coeff>\\d*)x(?:\\^(?P<exp>\\d+))?'
    as_int = lambda s: int(s) if s else 1
    result = ''
    for monom in re.finditer(my_regexp, polynomial):
        (sign, coeff, exp) = monom.groups()
        (coeff, exp) = list(map(as_int, (coeff, exp)))
        coeff *= exp
        exp -= 1
        if coeff != 0:
            result += ('{sign}{coeff}' if exp == 0 else '{sign}{coeff}x' if exp == -1 else '{sign}{coeff}x^{exp}').format(sign=sign, coeff=coeff, exp=exp)
    return result if result else '0'
